translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この船なら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's this ship...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それでも予定通りか。やっぱし……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it still on schedule? As I thought...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なら、目的地まで一週間ちゅうとこやな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, it should take about a week to the destination.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな。トラブルが少なければ、な。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's right. If there aren't many troubles.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この海じゃ、それを期待するだけ虚しいが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But in this sea, just hoping for that is futile.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「せやけど……それでもギリギリやで。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even so... it's barely enough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 準備して、出発して……けど、満ち潮が始まって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We prepared, departed... but the rising tide has started,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでで既に5日経過。一週間後は12日や」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and already five days have passed. One week from now will be day twelve.
...That's harsh.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 満ち潮が短けりゃ、アウトになる頃合いだ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If the tide is short, it'll be the time we're out of luck...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「急ぐだけ急ぐしかないんや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can only hurry as much as possible.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: せやから、ランス…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's why, Rance...
...Rance? Huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「アニキならめんどくさそーな顔して、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it's Aniki, he'd have that troublesome look,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 通りがかったかなみの姐御を捕まえて、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: grabbed Sister Kanami passing by,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 船室に引っ込んでったぜ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and retreated to the cabin.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー……難しい話、しすぎたかぁ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... Maybe we talked about too difficult subjects...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「おいおい……大丈夫か？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, hey... are you okay?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こっちはこっちで、仕事しよか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'll just get back to work over here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ポリポリとうなじを掻いてから、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After scratching the nape of his neck,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンは慣れた様子で自分の仕事に戻った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon returned to his work as if it was routine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 文字通りの順風が吹く航海に異変が現れたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The literal steady tailwind during the voyage changed,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼食を終えて、程なくしてからだった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: shortly after lunch had ended.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、ぐ、ぬぐぐぐぐ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, gu, nngghghgh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大丈夫ですか、ランス様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you okay, Lord Rance?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「気持ち悪い、っ……うぶぐえええええっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I feel sick... ubugueeeeee...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これで三度。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This was the third time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは、胃の中の昼食を海にぶちまけた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance vomited the lunch from his stomach into the sea.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「パーフェクトなまでの船酔いやなぁ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What a perfectly thorough seasickness...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 酔い止めの薬、飲んだか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Did you take any seasickness medicine?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さっき飲んだんですけど、効かないらしくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I took some earlier, but it seems like it's not working...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あー……前もって飲んどき、って言うたのに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah... I told you to take it beforehand...
Shiir~~~...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひーりんぐだ、ひーりんぐで治せ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's healing, heal it with healing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さ、さっきかけましたけど……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I, I just tried casting it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「無理ですね。そういうのは魔法では治りません」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's impossible. That kind of thing can't be cured by magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ……や、やくたたずどもめ……うぐぶっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn... you useless guys... ugh...
Gueeeeee, gueeeeeee...
Nn...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぷぅっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uppu...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとは逆の船縁で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the opposite side of the ship's rail from Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人が一人、死にかけていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a demon was on the verge of death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うぐうっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uguu...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: む、無敵結界が、効かない……だとっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-the invincible barrier, it's not working... is it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラサマ、サテラサマ、シッカリ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Satella, Lady Satella, hang in there...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいじょぶー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you okay?
S-stop it...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背中をさすろうとしたカロリアを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Karoria tried to rub her back,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはフラフラになりながらはねのける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Satella, staggering, pushed her away.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's impossible. That kind of thing can't be cured by magic.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ……や、やくたたずどもめ……うぐぶっ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn... you useless guys... ugh...
Gueeeeee, gueeeeeee...
Nn...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぷぅっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uppu...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスとは逆の船縁で、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On the opposite side of the ship's rail from Rance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人が一人、死にかけていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a demon was on the verge of death.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「う、うぐうっ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: U-uguu...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: む、無敵結界が、効かない……だとっ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Th-the invincible barrier, it's not working... is it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「サテラサマ、サテラサマ、シッカリ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lady Satella, Lady Satella, hang in there...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だいじょぶー？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you okay?
S-stop it...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 背中をさすろうとしたカロリアを、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Karoria tried to rub her back,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: サテラはフラフラになりながらはねのける。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but Satella, staggering, pushed her away.
